text: Melvin Van Peebles (August 21, 1932 - September 22, 2021) was an American movie maker, actor, novelist and composer. He was the father of actor Mario Van Peebles. Melvin Van Peebles created and acted in the blaxploitation movie Sweet Sweetback's Baadasssss Song in 1971. He also acted in many other movies from the 1970s to the 2010s. His first Hollywood movie was Watermelon Man in 1970. Van Peebles was born in Chicago, Illinois.
